summary: Provides a class that implements an Alternating Least Squares (ALS) matrix factorization model for training on interaction data, evaluating performance, generating top‑N recommendations, and exposing the learned user and item latent factor matrices as well as the full predicted rating matrix.
business_intent: Enable a collaborative‑filtering recommendation engine that can be trained on user‑item interaction logs to deliver personalized item suggestions and assess model quality.
